EmailTemplate.name: Training Feedback Invite Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Learning_Response_Result__c.Training__c} Feedback Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Learning_Response_Result__c.Name_of_Participant__c} ,
Thank you very much for participating the {!Learning_Response_Result__c.Training__c} May we kindly ask you to take 2 minutes to give us your valuable feedback for the {!Learning_Response_Result__c.Training__c} .
{!Learning_Response_Result__c.Feedback_Mail_Body__c}
Please click on below link to give your feedback
https://c2s.my.salesforce.com/apex/INDFeedbackPage?id={!Learning_Response_Result__c.Id} Kind Regards, Industrial BU Admin
